title: 6.1 Master Challenge 3
question: The data shown here is obtained after the run-length encoding process of an image. The two color values that are represented by the data are white and green. Decode the data and draw the image that it represents.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
